info.name: osu! but better
info.description: Dark theme, customizable, added anime background you missed after your old styles stopped working. Some things move and spin, that's pretty neat. Github and ranking icon credits available here
info.additionalInfo: 8-9 - Fixes to background and translucency 6-7-19 - Fixed stuff to work w/newest osu update - New ranking icon styles (credits @ github page) - Added option to switch between rank icon styles - New github page - Added option to add a custom user banner for non-supporters - New/old button now fades into nothing by default - Supporter icon spins 12-11 - Fixed stuff to work w/newest osu update - Side buttons are less annoying to look at - Added ability to disable old/new button - More bgs 10-8 - New comment section is translucent - Did somebody say "more backgrounds please" 7-5 - Triangles move again - More translucency - More love live bgs in settings - Overall translucency now adjustable in settings 5-14 - SS icon looks better 5-13 - Added new rank icons - Added rest of rankable mod icons - Triangles in banner move a bit upon page load (cool huh) - Fixed some bg and text issues 4-17 - Made certain BM listing stuff visible (oops) 4-16-18 - Initial release Known issues: - invoice for in order history has white on white - black usernames in forum a bit hard to read
